title: ‘I have no intentions of stopping:’ Chris Froome Confirms he will Race in 2024, and Puts Target on Tour de France Return
content:
Comments suggest four-time yellow jersey will remain at Israel Premier Tech and Froome is hopeful tweaks to riding position will relieve lower back pain.

Read the full article at ‘I have no intentions of stopping:’ Chris Froome Confirms he will Race in 2024, and Puts Target on Tour de France Return on Velo.
author: ahood
